Module fi.tuni.prog3.sisu
Package fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.models

Class RuleModule

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.models.RuleModule
public class RuleModule extends Object
A class for modeling the 'rule'/'rules' fields on the Sisu API. Can hold another RuleModel and an array of them under itself. Instantiated from JSON data using Jackson deserializer.

  • Constructor Details

    • RuleModule

      public RuleModule()
      Empty contructor. Actual attributes are set by Jackson API deserializer.

  • Method Details

    • setRule

      public void setRule(RuleModule rule)
      Sets a child RuleModule from the 'rule' field if one is present under this on the Sisu API. Should only be used by Jackson.
      Parameters:
      rule - the child RuleModule to be assigned under this

    • setRules

      public void setRules(RuleModule[] rules)
      Sets an array of child RuleModules from the 'rules' field if one is present under this on the Sisu API. Should only be used by Jackson.
      Parameters:
      rules - the RuleModule children to be assigned under this

    • setType

      public void setType(String type)
      Sets the type of this RuleModule from the Sisu API. Rule types are used to identify child StudyModules and child CourseModules. Should only be used by Jackson.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of this rule

    • setModuleGroupId

      public void setModuleGroupId(String id)
      Sets the groupID for a StudyModule if a suitable field is found from the Sisu API data. Exclusive with the setCourseUnitGroupId method. Should only be used by Jackson.
      Parameters:
      id - the groupID present in the field

    • setCourseUnitGroupId

      public void setCourseUnitGroupId(String id)
      Sets the groupID for a CourseModule if a suitable field is found from the Sisu API data. Exclusive with the setModuleGroupId method. Should only be used by Jackson.
      Parameters:
      id -

    • getRule

      public RuleModule getRule()
      Gets the possible child rule under this RuleModule.
      Returns:
      the RuleModule under this, can be null if none has been assigned

    • getRules

      public RuleModule[] getRules()
      Gets the possible 'rules' children RuleModules under this RuleModule.
      Returns:
      an array of RuleModules under this, can be null if none have been assigned

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of this rule.
      Returns:
      the type

    • getChildIds

      public ArrayList<String> getChildIds(String type)
      Gets the groupIDs for either StudyModules or CourseModules directly under this rule. Used to map StudyModules or CourseModules under a StudyModule and build a tree from this data.
      Parameters:
      type - a type listed within this class, what type of groupID to return
      Returns:
      all direct StudyModule children if MODULERULE is given as type, or all direct CourseModule children if COURSEUNITRULE is given as type
